title: Pi√±a colada cupcakes
ingredients: ['For the cupcakes', '175 g (6 oz) unsalted butter, softened', '175 g (6 oz) golden caster sugar', '3 large eggs, beaten', '75 g (3 oz) fresh pineapple or 2 rings in juice, chopped into small pieces', '175 g (6 oz) self-raising flour', '50 g (2 oz) desiccated coconut', '2 tbsp coconut cream', 'For the rum frosting', '115 g (4 oz) unsalted butter, softened', '225 g (8 oz) icing sugar', '2 tbsp light rum or Malibu', 'Blue and yellow sugar sprinkles, to decorate']
